mapper.select: select substring(s.seat_name,1,1) line,cast(substring(s.seat_name,2,3) as unsigned) seatno,s.screeningnumber,s.seat_name,s.type,r.cancel from seat s left join reservation r on s.screeningnumber=r.screeningnumber and s.seat_name=r.seat_seq and r.cancel != 'Y' where s.screeningnumber=#{search} order by line,seatno
